description__detail_with_name: Activity :word :name according to lobbying data published by the City of Portland, Oregon
description__detail_without_name: Activity according to lobbying data published by the City of Portland, Oregon
description__index_with_type: A list of :type involved in lobbying activity according to data published by the City of Portland, Oregon
description__index_without_type: Lobbying activity according to data published by the City of Portland, Oregon
entity__lobbyist_registration_not_found: No record of registration was found
entity__lobbyist_registration_statement: Registered to lobby on behalf of :name for :range
entity__registration_not_found: No record of registration was found
leaderboard__description_period: In :period, :lobbyists_total_result lobbyists representing :entities_total_result entities reported lobbying :officials_total_result City of Portland officials across :incident_count_result incidents.
leaderboard__description_since: Since 2014, :lobbyists_total_result lobbyists representing :entities_total_result entities reported lobbying :officials_total_result City of Portland officials across :incident_count_result incidents.
leaderboard__ranking_group: :group are ranked by total number of lobbying incident appearances.
leaderboard__ranking_member_total: Total number of lobbying incidents reported for this :member
leaderboard__view_full_list_with_subset: View all :subset in the full list of :group
param__deprecated: The :param parameter has been deprecated and will be removed soon. Please recreate your filter and update your bookmarks.
param__value_invalid: :value is not a valid value for :param.
person__as_lobbyist_entities: Interacted with City officials on behalf of these entities
person__as_official_entities: Was lobbied by representatives of these entities
person__as_official_officials: Was lobbied alongside these City officials
person__has_been_both: Has worked for the City and lobbied City officials
source__activity_disclaimer: Other than light formatting performed to facilitate database input, indexing to accommodate a modern API, and editing to address obvious typos and improve readability, data from this source remains as downloaded.
source__info_linked: Data was retrieved on :retrieved_date in :format format from the Portland City Auditor’s Office as published in accordance with the City’s Open Data Policy.
source__info_public_records_request: Data was received from the City of Portland on :retrieved_date in :format format via public records request.
source__personnel_disclaimer: Data has been condensed and edited to facilitate database input, address obvious typos, and improve readability, and some inferences have been made.
source__registration_disclaimer: Data has been condensed and edited to facilitate database input, address obvious typos, and improve readability.
